answers.answer: I have GD also and I can have it and it wont mess with my levels. But a girlfriend of mine had it when she was pregnant and she couldnt do any type of artificial sweetner; her body just reacted weird to them. I would try and see everyone is different. :)
Ok thanks! Well ive been under for all my levels so I may try it
